name: Dragon Dance VR
description:
Dragov Dance VR is fast-paced retro style VR scroller where you cut and shoot enemies and overcome timing and physical challenges along the way

  • feel fast-paced flow while killing and dodging
  • pull out your sword and cut the enemies with both hands or one hand while you are in the air
  • pick up the pistol and shoot the enemies with or without auto-aim
  • move your body and arms to cope with space and timing challenges
  • tune different game options to match your skills
